conversation.thought: Student_E is on our true priority list (4th of 5), but we have repeatedly rejected them while holding the single seat for higher-priority candidates (Student_B, Student_A, Student_D). In the current round, the only applicant in our inbox is Student_E, and we remain unmatched with quota 1. Given the late stage (round 14) and no evidence that higher-priority students will apply to us soon (they all rank other schools above School_C), continuing to reject risks ending unmatched. Accepting Student_E now fills the seat with an acceptable candidate on our list, which is better than remaining unfilled.
